channel.title: Remote Desktop on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Remote Desktop on TLDRBins

item.title: RDP
item.description: Enable RDP # Enable Terminal Server Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\System\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server' -Name 'fDenyTSConnections' -Value 0 # Allow Inbound Traffic netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Open Port 3389 IN" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=3389 xfreerdp remmina freerdp # Password xfreerdp /u:'<USER>' /p:'<PASSWORD>' /d:<DOMAIN> /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 # NTLM xfreerdp /u:'<USER>' /pth:'<HASH>' /d:<DOMAIN> /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 xfreerdp3 # Anonymous xfreerdp3 /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 /clipboard:direction-to:all /sec:nla:off # Password xfreerdp3 /u:'<USER>' /p:'<PASSWORD>' /d:<DOMAIN> /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 /clipboard:direction-to:all /sec:nla:off # NTLM xfreerdp3 /u:'<USER>' /pth:<HASH> /d:<DOMAIN> /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 /clipboard:direction-to:all /sec:nla:off # Local auth xfreerdp3 /u:'<USER>' /p:'<PASSWORD>' /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 /clipboard:direction-to:all /sec:tls:off # Socks5 xfreerdp3 /u:'<USER>' /p:'<PASSWORD>' /d:<DOMAIN> /v:<TARGET> /smart-sizing:1920x1080 /clipboard:direction-to:all /sec:nla:off /proxy:socks5://127.

item.title: VNC
item.description: General # Connect vncviewer <TARGET>:5901 -passwd <SECRET_FILE> Note: secret is a cookie binary file
